title: Nvidia no longer acquiring Arm following regulatory concerns
content:
Nvidia revealed in 2020 its intentions to buy Arm, a chip designer company owned by Japanese multinational SoftBank. While rumors already suggested that Nvidia might pull out of the acquisition, a new report from the Financial Times (via Axios) says that negotiations “collapsed” on Monday.

more…

The post Nvidia no longer acquiring Arm following regulatory concerns appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Nvidia revealed in 2020 its intentions to buy Arm. However, concerns from regulatory agencies caused Nvidia to reconsider its plan.
